name: Christmas Hentai
description:
Christmas didn't go according to plan, this year Santa Claus changed his plans. He did not go to give gifts to children, but went to rest on the island with his Snow Maidens. He hid gifts on the island and set up guards, while he hid in the tower. Collect all the gifts on the island for children, defeat enemies and fight the boss, punish the villain.

  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 different weapons
  • Advanced AI
